articles.title: Talks between Military Delegations of DPRK and Cuba
articles.content:
Talks between Military Delegations of DPRK and Cuba
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The military delegations of the Korean People's Army and Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces had talks in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					Present there were Yun Tong Hyon, vice minister of the People's Armed Forces and generals and officers of the KPA on the DPRK side and the members of delegation headed by Joaquin Quintas Sola, vice minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces and Leonardo Perez Mesa, military attache of Cuban embassy here, on the Cuban side.
					
					At the talks both sides expressed willingness to further develop the friendly ties between the two armies and exchanged views on the issues of mutual concern.
					
					The talks proceeded in comradely and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Secretary of WPK Central Committee Meets Italian Guests
articles.content:
Secretary of WPK Central Committee Meets Italian Guests
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday met and had a talk with Osvaldo Napoli, chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament who is vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy, and his party.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Gives Reception for Italian Guests
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Gives Reception for Italian Guests
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a reception in honor of the vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy, and his party, at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Thursday.
					Present there on invitation were Osvaldo Napoli, chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament who is vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy, and his party, and Sergio Mercuri, Italian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					Present there were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					Speeches were made by Kim Yong Il and Osvaldo Napoli at the reception.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Indian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Indian Ambassador to DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Pratap Singh, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell visit to him Thursday.

articles.title: Reception Given in DPRK Embassy in Beijing to Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Reception Given in DPRK Embassy in Beijing to Mark DPRK Anniversary
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sept. 4 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					Present there on invitation were the vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China, the vice-minister of Railways of China, the vice-president of the Xinhua News Agency, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, Yang Yanyi, assistant to head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and other officials concerned.
					
					Present there were Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Ji said in his speech that the 64-year-long history of the DPRK was the proud history of victory in which the Korean people made a vigorous advance to build a thriving nation weathering all sorts of trials and ordeals under the leadership of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the cause of Juche and Songun revolution started in Mt. Paektu will be accomplished generation after generation, he noted.
					
					Noting that the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Chinese leaders is being consolidated and developed as the days go by under the deep care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and Comrade Hu Jintao, he reaffirmed the will to make positive efforts to boost the bilateral relations in the future, too.
					
					The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China noted that the Koreans registered proud successes in the building of Korean style socialism under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il over the last 64 years.
					
					Today the Korean people are dynamically stepping up the building of a thriving nation through the aggressive and vigorous struggle, united close around Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea, he said.
					
					He said that it is the steadfast strategic policy of the party and government of China to steadily consolidate and develop the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative ties, expressing the will to continue to develop the bilateral ties in the spirit of inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation, and to make fresh contributions to bringing happiness to the two peoples and ensuring the peace and stability in the region.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from WPM Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from WPM Leader
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Aug. 27.
					The message said:
					
					Esteemed Comrade First Secretary,
					
					I have the honor to extend warmest congratulations to you on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung as a genuine people's state on Sept. 9, 1948, steadily grew strong to be a Juche-oriented socialist state which has unbreakable single-minded unity and military capability thanks to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Availing myself of this significant opportunity, I would like to express conviction that the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the nation-building would shine more brilliantly under your wise Songun revolutionary leadership and sincerely wish you good health for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK and the final victory of the cause of socialism in the world.
					
					I renew the assurances of the highest consideration to you.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Political Party Figure of Italy
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Political Party Figures of Italy
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy and his party.
					The gift was handed over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, by Osvaldo Napoli, chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament who is vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy, on a visit to the DPRK on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Thursday received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China, on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Members of a delegation of the Commission for Propaganda and Training Affairs of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and a delegation of the Central Committee of the Fatherland Front of Vietnam laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday before paying tribute to them.
					The delegations arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the All-China Journalists Association led by Huang Libiao, president of China Women Newspaper, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members, they looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					They climbed Mangyong Hill to tour the revolutionary sites on it.
					
					The head of the delegation said after the visit the President was a great revolutionary who worked hard to build a people's country.
					
					The delegation visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Party Founding Memorial Tower, Mansudae Art Studio, West Sea Barrage, Friendship Tower and other places.

articles.title: Head of Chinese Delegation Hopes for Korean People's Prosperity
articles.content:
Head of Chinese Delegation Hopes for Korean People's Prosperity
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Huang Libiao, head of the delegation of the All-China Journalists Association on a visit to the DPRK, was interviewed with a KCNA reporter on Thursday.
					He said:
					
					Visiting various places during his sojourn, he learned a lot.
					
					The Korean people single-mindedly united around the leader have made a leaping progress in all fields of building a prosperous country in high spirit.
					
					Various cities including Pyongyang are very beautiful and clean and people living in modern dwelling houses are enjoying a happy life.
					
					Under the correct policy of the party and the government of the DPRK, every fabrics of social life are ensured at the high standard.
					
					In particular, we came to know once again the firm unity of the army and the people around the Workers' Party of Korea through visits to the Tower of the Juche idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, etc.
					
					We were excited to see the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".
					
					The performance helped us know well about the past and present of Korea.
					
					Media plays an important role in the development of the China-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					We will contribute to China-DPRK friendship by boosting exchange and making close cooperation between the media organizations of the two countries.
					
					We will introduce to the Chinese people the successes made by the Korean people in building the economy.
					
					Our hope is that the Korean people will achieve greater prosperity, united close around the great WPK.

articles.title: Brazilian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Embroidery Institute
articles.content:
Brazilian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Embroidery Institute
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin and his embassy officials visited the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute on Thursday to mark the 190th anniversary of independence of Brazil.
					They looked round embroidery creation rooms, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung personally chose the site of the institute and that the employees of the institute have made efforts to develop Korean-style embroidery.
					
					The ambassador made an entry in the visitors' book.

articles.title: Ex-Chinese Ambassador Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Ex-Chinese Ambassador Visits Mangyongdae
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Ex-Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wan Yongxiang and his party visited Mangyongdae. 
					At the old home where President Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, nurturing his ardent will for revolution, the guests looked round relics there, being briefed on the time-honored house.  
					
					They also went round the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					Wan Yongxiang said:
					
					The President was born in a patriotic and revolutionary family. All its members dedicated themselves to the liberation of Korea.
					
					He was not only the leader of the Korean people but also a close friend of the Chinese people. 
					
					The Chinese people deep revere him. 
					
					They will always remember Mangyongdae.
					
					In the meantime, the guests visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and other places and enjoyed the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of various countries, representatives of international organizations and the economic and commercial councilors corps here Thursday visited the National Gifts Exhibition House on the 64th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					They looked round gifts presented to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by people at home and overseas compatriots.
					
					Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, said after visit that the visit offered him an opportunity to learn ardent reverence of the Koreans inside and outside the country for the great leaders.
					
					He expressed his belief that the Korean people would achieve greater successes under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Brazilian ambassador Roberto Colin said he had never seen such splendid exhibition house before, adding that he was deeply impressed by the great number of the gifts with warm devotion of all Koreans.
					
					Arkady Lavrov, senior councilor of the Russian embassy, said the gifts presented to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il reflect the boundless admiration of the Koreans for them.
					
					The feats performed by the great leaders would always be remembered by Koreans, he noted.
					
					Diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here visited Ryongaksan recreation ground on the same day.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Youth in China Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Youth in China Leaves
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Federation of Korean Youth in China led by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo left here on Thursday after participating in the celebrations of Youth Day.

articles.title: World First Aid Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World First Aid Day Observed in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- There took place in Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 on Thursday an event to observe World First Aid Day.
					Present there were officials and members of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, the delegation of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and members of the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					
					The participants in the event watched first-aid-related games of young RC members and volunteers.
					
					They talked with them about Red Cross activities.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Vow to Successfully Finish Reconstruction Project of War Museum
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Vow to Successfully Finish Reconstruction Project of War Museum
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum will take on a new look and this area will turn into a comprehensive educational center along with the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The museum is an edifice conveying feats performed by the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of defending the country displayed by the army and the people of the DPRK in the 1950s.
					
					The project is another huge one to be undertaken under the long-term plan and energetic leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					The successful completion of the project would help visitors deeply grasp the President's Juche-oriented military idea and the anti- imperialist revolutionary idea and outstanding leadership art and make a great contribution to educating all the service personnel and people so that they may learn from the forerunners' precious fighting spirit. 
					
					The Supreme Commander ordered the KPA to newly build the museum in a bold manner and successfully spruce up this area along with the War Memorial Tower. 
					
					A meeting of service personnel of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces took place in front of main sculpture "Victory" of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower to thoroughly carry out the order given by Kim Jong Un to finish the project till the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Jong Gak, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service persons.
					
					A report was made by Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, to be followed by speeches.
					
					They called upon all the soldier-builders to unconditionally finish the project in the fixed time and thus demonstrate once again the tremendous might of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary armed forces under the great Songun brilliant commander.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for Education
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for Education
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Thirty-five years have passed since President Kim Il Sung made public "Theses on Socialist Education", a great program of Juche-based education, on September 5, Juche 66 (1977).
					On this anniversary, the DPRK people recollect the immortal exploits performed by the President for the development of the nation's education.
					
					Expounded in the theses are all theoretical and practical issues arising in socialist education, including the fundamentals and principles of pedagogy and the content and methods of socialist education.
					
					The President clarified the important matters arising in implementing the theses in every period of the developing revolution and paid deep concern to the development of the educational work until the last moments of his life.
					
					He turned the DPRK into a country of learning and laid solid foundations for steady development of the Juche-oriented education. This is his great exploit that will remain forever in the history of the nation.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il wisely guided the work to carry out the theses on socialist education advanced by the President.
					
					He authored "On Further Developing Educational Work" and other celebrated works to clearly indicate the orientation and ways for effecting a new turn in educational work as required by the developing situation.
					
					Touring Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, he took measures to improve general secondary education and bring about a turn in higher education.
					
					He spared nothing for the rising generations and the development of educational work though the country was undergoing hardships.
					
					Such loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il provided the most popular and advanced educational system and the ramified educational networks in the country.
					
					The validity of the theses on socialist education will be steadily displayed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un inheriting the preceding leaders' noble outlook on posterity and future.

articles.title: GFTUK Gives Performance on Founding Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
GFTUK Gives Performance to Mark DPRK Anniversary
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) gave a performance at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday in celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					The performers lauded the revolutionary life and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built the country in which the people have become masters, the new country of independence and turned it into the ever-victorious socialist power.
					
					They impressively depicted the boundless respect and admiration for the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is glorifying the great Kim Il Sung's country, Kim Jong Il's country in numbers like mixed chorus "Our Beloved Leader ".
					
					They put on the stage such numbers as dialogic poem "The Great Dedication", male solo and Pangchang "When We Sing of Songun" and female vocal trio "Song of Love for People".
					
					The performers well showed the noble spiritual world of the Korean working class and members of the trade union who are making patriotic devotion to the building of a rich and powerful country true to the noble intention of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: National Program Contest Held
articles.content:
National Program Contest Held
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) - The 13th national program contest in the educational field took place at the E-library of Kim Il Sung University between Sept. 4 and 6.
					More than 200 students selected from across the country competed, divided into categories of universities and colleges.
					
					The participants gave full play to their ability getting prepared to be scientific and technological talents who will contribute to the building of a prosperous country. 
					
					During the period of contest, they exchanged successes and experience made in the development of programs.
					
					Students of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, University of Science, Wonsan College of Medicine, Mangyongdae Machine College and Chongjin Railway Operation College won good appraisal.
					
					A closing ceremony was held at the E-library of Kim Il Sung University on Thursday.

articles.title: National Ssirum Tournament to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
National Ssirum Tournament to Be Held in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The 10th National Ssirum (Korean Wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize will take place on picturesque Rungna Islet here from September 14 to 17.
					The tournament, to be held on the occasion of Harvest Moon Day (15th day of the eighth lunar month), a folk holiday, will be attended by wrestlers selected from Pyongyang and Nampho cities and provinces of the country.
					
					It will involve team event and open-category event. Each team is made up of five players, including one under 15 and another above sixty.
					
					The annual tournament is attracting increasing public interest in the country.
					
					In the past tournaments their titles were taken by wrestlers from Pyongyang City and North Phyongan Province. Pak Chun Min of Pyongyang won the 4th, 5th and 6th tournaments and Ri Jo Won of North Phyongan Province the 7th, 8th and 9th tournaments.
					
					Experts regard Ri Jo Won as hopeful of the forthcoming tournament for his past records and skills. But it is hard to foresee the results as a lot of excellent wrestlers have appeared throughout the country.
					
					The grand bull for the forthcoming tournament weighs 950 kilograms.

articles.title: National Farm Machine Exhibition and Meeting of Inventors Held
articles.content:
National Farm Machine Exhibition and Meeting of Inventors Held
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A national farm machine exhibition and meeting of inventors took place in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province between Sept. 4 and 6.
					On display at the exhibition were more than 220 types of farm machines, tractors, spare parts of farm implements and jigs and equipment of 74 kinds contrived and manufactured by officials, scientists, technicians and working people in the field of agriculture.
					
					Drawing the attention of visitors were Chollima tractor which realized rice chaff gasification, well-nourished rice seedling transplanter, hand-driven rice-seedling digger, motor-driven weeding machine in paddy fields, multipurpose harvester, pedal sprayer, rice harvesting combine and deep layer plough, etc. 
					
					The inventors' meeting exchanged the achievements and experience gained in the course of contriving, manufacturing and introducing efficient farm machines helpful to developing the country's agriculture and discussed scientific and technological issues arising in agricultural production.

articles.title: New Species of Dwarf Fruit Trees Developed by Farmer in DPRK
articles.content:
New Species of Dwarf Fruit Trees Developed by Farmer in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Yun Won Jong, 68, a peasant of the Oryu Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, has succeeded in cultivating high-yield species of dwarf fruit trees.
					The new species include apricot, peach and plum trees, which can yield fruits 3.5 to 5 times higher than others.
					
					Ra Jong Sam, management board chairman of the farm, told KCNA:
					
					"Yun Won Jong has devoted himself to cultivating the new species for scores of years, out of mind to do a good job for the country.
					
					During the years, he has used his family garden as a nursery with rooms of his house always packed with potted saplings.
					
					Even when he was hospitalized, he took care of potted saplings."
					
					Yun was awarded three certificates of inventions.
					
					The new species are easy to cultivate and high in economic value.
					
					Yun said:
					
					"People suggest that I write a doctorate thesis.
					
					Of course, honor is precious for me but to make a contribution to developing the country with honest mind is more precious.
					
					I think the country will remember me when the new species produce a high yield of fruits in orchards across it."

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with Cubans Held
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with Cubans Held
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- There took place in DPRK-Cuba friendship Moranbong Secondary School No.1 on Sept. 6 a friendly gathering with staff members of the Cuban embassy here on the occasion of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					Present there on invitation were German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					Also present were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries of the DPRK, and officials concerned and teachers and students at the school.
					
					Being briefed on the fact that the students of the school are growing up to be the pillars of the future under the loving care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the Cubans went round a room dedicated to the history of the school and a "room for friendship with Cuba" and "Jose Marti Class" and other places.
					
					They enjoyed an art performance given by students and talked about developing the bilateral relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats for Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's Feats for Building Thriving Nation
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday dedicates a bylined article to the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might".
					The work, published on Sep. 5, 2008, reviews with pride the 60-year long history of the DPRK in which it won victories under the leadership of the great leader and the great party.
					
					It also clarifies the popular and independent character of the DPRK based on the Juche idea and its invincible might. It comprehensively indicates the tasks and ways for vigorously speeding up the building of a thriving nation.
					
					The work serves as a very important document which the army and people of the DPRK should hold fast to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation of Juche, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The dignity and might of the DPRK reached the highest level under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					He enforced the policy of love and trust in the people all his life, taking the noble maxim of believing in people as in Heaven as a starting-point and a basic ideal of nation-building and state activities. He laid it down as a fundamental principle for building a rich and powerful country to preserve Juche character and national identity and maintain the line of independence and strictly adhered to it in the whole period of his leadership over the revolution. 
					
					Songun was his political creed, a way of struggle and revolutionary practice.
					
					It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the DPRK could demonstrate its dignity as a socialist military power with matchless revolutionary armed forces and powerful defense industry.
					
					Kim Jong Il firmly protected the dignity and destiny of the country and its people with arms and paved a wide avenue for achieving the prosperity of the country with Songun. These immortal patriotic exploits will shine forever.

articles.title: DPRK Will Keep to Road of Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Keep to Road of Socialism: Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The forces hostile to the DPRK are desperately seeking to make its people harbor illusion about the Western world in a bid to make them abandon their independent stance. They also try to render ineffective the DPRK's defense capacities which it has so far built up and deter it from following the road of socialism.
					However, it is a pipe dream that can never come true, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a bylined article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Immutable and steadfast is the will of the Workers' Party, the army and people of the DPRK to carry out to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					This has been proven as an immutable truth in the road of independence, Songun and socialism covered by all the servicepersons and people under the leadership of the great Party.
					
					The Korean nation that was small and weak was trampled down by big powers. It has now emerged a powerful socialist nation independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy, self-reliant in national defense based on the idea of independence.
					
					The Korean people are displaying their dignity as independent people no one dare provoke.
					
					Thanks to the Songun policy, the military muscle and national power have been remarkably augmented, and the position and influence of the DPRK have reached the highest level.
					
					In the DPRK, all the people are firmly united around their leader in thinking and purpose and in terms of morality and obligation, and whole society turned into a big harmonious family in which all the people help and lead each other forward.
					
					This is an essential character of DPRK-style socialism and the source of its mammoth strength.
					
					To the Korean nation, the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and        Kim Jong Il were not only leaders but benevolent fathers of a big socialist family.
					
					All the service members and people of the DPRK value and love the socialism of Juche, the supreme patriotic legacy bequeathed by the great father, as the cradle of their life. The Korean people will never abandon socialism, their life and soul.
					
					We, descendants of Kim Il Sung's nation and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il, will keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism following in the footsteps of the two great men no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and despite any ordeal.
					
					Let us advance forward to the final victory under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, our destiny and future.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Assailed
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued Information Bulletin No. 1009 on Thursday condemning the south Korean authorities for becoming evermore reckless in their anti-DPRK racket for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen these days.
					It says:
					
					Shortly ago the group of traitors held what it called "ceremony of inaugurating the month of the north's human rights" at the "memorial hall for constitutional government of the National Assembly" by bringing together human scum and philistines.
					
					At this ridiculous farce officials of the "Saenuri Party" which earned ill fame as a political party of traitors and confrontation maniacs and officials concerned of the "Ministry of Unification" made "speeches" or "congratulatory addresses".
					
					The group is mulling using the month of September for staging such ruckuses in different places of south Korea as "film festival", "seminar" and "exhibition" aimed at malignantly slandering the DPRK and painting a wrong picture of the Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					It also plans to let such human scum as defectors to the south who betrayed the country and the nation travel foreign countries to incite the inter-Korean confrontation even in international arena.
					
					Such dirty anti-DPRK human rights campaign is another unpardonable politically-motivated provocation to it and undisguised hostile action, the bulletin notes, and goes on:
					
					As is known to everybody, socialism in the DPRK is the best one in the world as it considers the people as the most valuable being and puts their interests above anything else.
					
					This being a hard fact, the puppet regime is busy with the anti-DPRK smear campaign, trumpeting about "human rights." This is nothing but a revelation of its black-hearted intention to hide its conversion of south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights and democracy and calm down the south Korean people's resistance against its unpopular rule and realize its wild ambition to realize the confrontation of the social systems.
					
					This brings into bolder relief the group's true colors as foolish psychopaths and political idiots obsessed with pipe dreams, ignorant of what is going on in the world.
					
					All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are now filled with the will to make a clean sweep of the rat-like Lee group trying hard to hurt the inviolable dignity and system of the DPRK and bring earlier the final victory in the great war for national reunification.
					
					The south Korean puppet regime would be well advised to properly face up to the trend of the times and behave itself.

articles.title: UFG under Fire in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
UFG under Fire in Foreign Countries
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ecuador, Bangladesh and Sweden issued statements on August 22 and 23 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime for staging Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises.
					The Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People said UFG proves that the U.S. imperialists are, indeed, wreckers of peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world and war provocateurs. It went on:
					
					The army and people of the DPRK who remain loyal to the Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, single-mindedly united around him, will shatter the moves of the aggressors to ignite a war and achieve a final victory in the sacred war for national reunification without fail with their tremendous military muscle.
					
					We bitterly denounce the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique to ignite a new war and voice invariable support for the Korean people in their struggle to wipe out the aggressors and reunify the country.
					
					The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee said in its statement:
					
					The situation in the Korean Peninsula has been pushed to the brink of a war and the peace in the peninsula and Northeast Asia seriously threatened due to the reckless military provocations of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities. 
					
					The above-said joint military exercises are not a saber-rattling of defensive nature to cope with someone's "threat" but an escalation of adventurous exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to ignite a nuclear war in the peninsula at any cost.
					
					They should properly face up to the trend of the times.
					
					The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association branded the recent UFG as a blatant violation of the Armistice Agreement.

articles.title: Memorial Services for Victims of Great Kanto Quake Held in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Services for Victims of Great Kanto Quake Held in Japan
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Memorial services for Koreans killed during the great Kanto quake were held in different parts of Japan on September 1 on the lapse of 89 years since the massacre of tens of thousands of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists on the basis of groundless rumors spread by them after the disaster. 
					A memorial service of Koreans in Tokyo was held in front of a monument to the massacred Koreans.
					
					Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) who doubles as chairman of the Committee for Rights and Welfare, Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, and other officials and Koreans and students in Japan.
					
					The participants paid silent tribute to the dead.
					
					Hwang Myong said in a memorial address that at that time, the Japanese authorities proclaimed a martial law, mobilizing troops, police, etc. to perpetrate monstrous massacre of Koreans in Japan.  
					
					Nearly 90 years have passed since then, but Japan is still refusing to probe the truth about the massacre, far from making any apology and reparation for it, he charged.
					
					He also condemned the Japanese authorities of excluding only Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools and banning the entry of ship Mangyongbong-92, preventing Koreans in Japan from freely visiting their homeland.   
					
					He urged the Japanese authorities to lift the frantic sanctions against the DPRK and unreasonable national discrimination and human rights abuses against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and realize the normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations on the basis of Japan's redemption of its past crimes this year, the tenth anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Pyongyang declaration.
					
					Speeches were made by Kim Kwan Chol, chairman of the Etogawa chapter of Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Pak Yu Ri, student of Tokyo Senior High School, and representative of Tokyo Metropolitan Assemblymen's League for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and the Tokyo Dietmen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan, Nigeria
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Kyrgyzstan and a Korean photo exhibition was held in Nigeria from August 24 to 31 to mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					Displayed in their venue were photos on immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in the effort for founding and developing the DPRK.
					
					Also displayed there were photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					Present there were personages of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, the Kyrgyz Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria and masses.
					
					The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan who is chief of the Kyrgyz Group for the Study of the Juche Idea referred to the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed in the effort for founding and developing the DPRK.
					
					At the end of the last century when the human cause of independence was in great difficulties due to the collapse of socialism in the East European countries, the DPRK firmly defended socialism and won only victories despite the worst adversity under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, he noted, and went on:
					
					The Korean people are now striving to build a thriving socialist country, united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said it was Kim Il Sung and 
					
					Kim Jong Il who built a country of the people, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5000 years, a powerful socialist country which stands unfazed by any storm and stress of history. 
					
					He noted that the DPRK which remains dignified for its independence in politics, powerful for its self-supporting economy and unshakable for its self-reliance in defence is always sure to triumph.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked in Ethiopia, Cambodia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked in Ethiopia, Cambodia
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were published in Ethiopia and Cambodia on August 22 and 25 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea carried an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un and Guards Tank Division" on its bulletin No. 42.
					
					The Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army became an invincible division under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership by providing field guidance to the division on August 25, 1960, developing the unit as a steel-like division.
					
					Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's inspection of this division as his first official activity as the Supreme Commander of the KPA means the solemn declaration of his will to carry forward to the last the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection.
					
					He learned about the combat preparedness of the division and gave instructions to serve as guidelines for steadily developing it.
					
					"Devoted defence of Kim Jong Un!" shouted by soldiers in tears that day was not a slogan shouted by that division only.
					
					Socialist Korea will always win victory, demonstrating the might of Songun.
					
					The Cambodian news agency AKP carried an article titled "Immortal Songun Exploits" on its bulletin.
					
					It said that the DPRK turned into a single-mindedly united political and ideological power and ushered in a new period of prosperity under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Lao News Agency, Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Reported by Lao News Agency, Bangladeshi Paper
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A Lao news agency and Bangladeshi paper Blits reported the detailed gist of the dear respected  Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of the Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" on August 29 and 30.
					This speech made by Kim Jong Un at the banquet given to celebrate August 25, 2012 clarifies the firm decision and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to defend the security of the country and the gains of the revolution and build a reunified thriving nation on this land, more tightly holding the arms of Songun.

articles.title: Group for Study of Kimjongilism of Nigeria Renamed
articles.content:
Group for Study of Kimjongilism of Nigeria Renamed
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of renaming the Group for Study of Kimjongilism of Nigeria Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism was held in Abuja City, Nigeria on August 29.
					Seen on the front wall of the venue of the ceremony were portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					Present there were personages and members of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and affiliated Group for the Study of Juche Idea including the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism and teaching staff of the International College of Journalism.
					
					Speeches were made there.
					
					Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il publicly recognized as a great guiding idea in the era of independence as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. This was an event of great historic significance for the progressive people struggling for independence and socialism.
					
					A decision on renaming the Group for the Study of Kimjongilism of Nigeria as the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Nigeria and Igwanagu Nicholas was elected its chairman.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Bulgarian Organization
						
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued bulletin No. 7 on August 23 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					The bulletin edited an article titled "Foundation of DPRK" and other articles. It elaborated on how the DPRK was founded on September 9, 1948. It said:
					
					The DPRK has turned into a prospering country in which the principles -- independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence -- were thoroughly applied under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Today the Korean people are pushing forward socialist construction, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					The DPRK set it as its goal of economic development to build a thriving nation and this drew world attention.
					
					The Korean people are developing the country's economy into the technology-intensive economy by dint of latest science and technology developed by their own efforts.
					
					Biological engineering technology, nano technology, nuclear technology and space technology are rapidly developing.
					
					What draws attention in the economic development of the DPRK is that its economy is advancing in the direction of further strengthening the foundation of the independent economy on the basis of its own fuel and raw materials.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. y AIEA en tema de reactor de agua ligera
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. y AIEA en tema de reactor de agua ligera
						
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 5 en relacion con la injusta acusacion de Estados Unidos y la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica en el tema de construccion del reactor de agua ligera por parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					Recientemente, en su reporte presentado a la reunion de la junta de administradores de la AIEA, el director general de este organismo dijo que causan seria preocupacion la construccion de reactor de agua ligera y el enriquecimiento de uranio de la RPDC.
					
					En sintonia con tal criterio, un portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. insistio en que la RPDC suspenda las actividades nucleares incluyendo la construccion de reactor de agua ligera y acepte la inspeccion de la AIEA.
					
					Anda perdida todavia la AIEA que agravo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana sumandose a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. y perdio por eso el derecho a intervenir en las actividades nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					La AIEA, que hasta ahora no expreso nunca la preocupacion sobre el programa nuclear de otros paises poseedores de armas nucleares, lo hizo de manera discriminada solo en el caso de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es un acto injusto que carece de imparcialidad.
					
					La AIEA y EE.UU. no deberan tratar de ver la realidad de hoy con la vieja pauta que valia cuando las actividades nucleares de la RPDC se limitaban a los fines pacificos.
					
					La RPDC, que se convirtio en el digno portador de arma nuclear frente a la continua politica hostil de EE.UU., tiene la norma al estilo coreano, con la que no puede hacer nada la AIEA con su facultad de tratar los asuntos principalmente de los Estados desnuclearizados.
					
					La AIEA y EE.UU. deben actuar con prudencia justipreciando la realidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad italiana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad italiana
						
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dirigiera Osvaldo Napoli, presidente del Comite del Parlamento por el Desarrollo de Relaciones y Cooperacion con la RPDC y vicepresidente del Grupo Parlamentario de Libertad Popular de la Camara de Diputados de Italia, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo entrego el dia 6 a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del coordinador del PTM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje del coordinador del PTM
						
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 27 de agosto Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinador del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico.
					El mensaje senala que el remitente tiene el honor de extender las mas calidas felicitaciones al destinatario en nombre de todos los militantes del PTM y en el suyo propio con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Prosigue que la RPDC, fundada el 9 de septiembre de 1948 por el gran camarada Kim Il Sung como verdadero Estado del pueblo, ha venido fortaleciendose y desarrollandose continuamente como pais socialista del Juche con invencible unidad monolitica y poderio militar gracias al estimado camarada Kim Jong Il.
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que las hazanas inmortales acumuladas por los grandes camaradas Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la edificacion del pais brillaran mas gracias a la sabia direccion del destinatario sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Desea de todo corazon al destinatario la buena salud por la eterna prosperidad de la RPDC y la victoria final de la causa socialista del mundo.
					
					Finalmente, manifiesta el testimonio de la mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones militares de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones militares de Corea y Cuba
						
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias de Cuba. 
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Yun Tong Hyon, los generales y oficiales del EPC, y por la cubana, los miembros de la delegacion encabezada por el viceministro de las FAR, Joaquin Quintas Sola, y el agregado militar de la embajada cubana en Corea, Leonardo Perez Mesa. 
					
					Ambas partes expresaron la voluntad de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad entre los ejercitos de los dos paises e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los asuntos de interes mutuo. 
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un clima camaraderil y amistoso.

articles.title: CRPP publica la informacion no. 1009
articles.content:
CRPP publica la informacion no. 1009
						
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, se torna mas brutal que nunca en territorio surcoreano la conspiracion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para fomentar la confrontacion fratricida, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 6 la informacion no. 1009 que sigue:
					Hace unos dias, la banda titere surcoreana sostuvo en el "museo memorial de la Asamblea Nacional" la llamada "ceremonia de declaracion del mes para los derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea)" con la participacion de unos fulanos y menganos y algunos politiqueros.
					
					A la ocasion estuvieron presentes tambien los compinches del "Partido Saenuri", connotada agrupacion vendepatria y conflictiva, y hasta los relacionados del Ministerio de Unificacion quienes pronunciaron las "palabras de estimulo y felicitacion".
					
					En el mes de septiembre, los traidores surcoreanos intentan organizar en distintas partes la "proyeccion filmica", el "simposio", la "exhibicion" y otros actos por el estilo para calumniar perversamente a la RPDC y tergiversar la verdadera imagen del regimen socialista humano-centrico de ella.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, planean extender a la arena internacional la campana de confrontacion intercoreana al organizar una gira extranjera de los tipejos sucios que huyeron traicionando a la patria y la nacion.
					
					Esta asquerosa campana anti-RPDC en el sector de derechos humanos es otra imperdonable provocacion politica y abierto acto hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Como todos saben, nuestro socialismo es el mas ventajoso del mundo centrado en las masas populares donde el pueblo es ente mas valioso y lo todo obedece a sus intereses.
					
					A pesar de esta realidad, la banda surcoreana lanza esa campana para encubrir su crimen de traicion de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en la tierra privada de DDHH y de democracia, calmar las protestas de la opinion publica sobre sus politicas antipopulares y realizar su ambicion de enfrentarse con el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					De esa forma, los traidores surcoreanos mostraron una vez mas su asquerosa fachada de psicopatas y politicos tontos que suenan con lo irrealizable sin conocer como marchan las cosas del mundo.
					
					Ahora, todos los militares y civiles coreanos estan decididos a exterminar despiadadamente a la horda ratonesca, que se atreve a ofender la sagrada dignidad y regimen de la RPDC, y lograr cuanto antes la victoria final en la gran guerra de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La banda surcoreana debe portarse con prudencia viendo correctamente la corriente de la epoca.
